titles.title: STOP Illicit Drones Act
Stemming The Operation of Pernicious and Illicit Drones Act
STOP Illicit Drones Act

A bill to prohibit the Federal Aviation Administration from awarding any Federal assistance to entities from certain foreign countries for projects related to unmanned aircraft systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
